runs.comm: presses right back to clip the back-of-length delivery past square-leg. That closed bat-face and that on-side clip.
just outside the off stump and Smith taps it back down the track. He now wants the people to settle down behind the sightscreen.
slants away from the off-stump line and Smith punches it to the off side
around the off stump line, eased to covers
stays beside the line of the delivery and forces it to point
slower yorker, well almost at the blockhole, pushed out to the on side for a quick single
a bit of width, Smith cracks it towards point, reaches the fielder on the bounce, gets his fingertips to it but can't stop it
back of length ball slanting down the leg, Bosman moves across and tries to pull that one, he misses but it is too far down the leg side
on offstump, whipped towards square leg after walking across the stumps
length ball on middle and off, Smith gets on the front foot and taps the ball towards cover
seams away from Smith after pitching back of a length, Smith looks to drive down the ground but is beaten
a touch shorter and on legstump, cramping Smith for room, blocked to the leg side, that came in a touch off the seam
well outside offstump, Smith brings out his patented shovel shot, sends the ball behind square leg
short of length ball on legstump, slower delivery, tucked behind square leg by Smith
length ball outside off, Bosman stands tall and punches towards cover, placement isn't good enough to get a run
a bit more width this time, Bosman absolutely hammers that one past extra cover, pure power that
extra bounce from Shoaib, well outside off, Bosman looked to cut but is beaten
much closer to offstump this time, played with an angled bat behind point
that one jags in, 141 kmh from Shoaib, Bosman looks to dismiss that one into the crowd, gets nowhere near the ball
Smith makes a touch of room and powers the ball towards cover point, plenty of power but can't place it wide of the fielder there

Smith skips away beyond leg and down the track, Gul sends a regulation delivery angling across offstump, Smith attempts an ugly jab and can't connect, Gul walks up to him and gives him some batting tips, presumably
Smith wins this mini-contest, a leg stump gift form Gul, Smith drills it wide of mid-on for four, Gul has no words of advice this time

way down the leg side, Smith nearly holes out but picks up four more, a half-volley is helped along by Smith, the ball almost carries all the way to short fine leg, lands just short and a bit wide of him and he can't stop that one
no footwork from Smith as he looks to guides the ball behind point, was there a thin edge to the keeper? Pakistan seem to think so, the umpire doesn't
bit of width, Smoith bisects the two fielders square on the off side to pick up his third boundary of the over, two men chase after it but can't cut it off
Bosman punches this one towards cover, no run
no half-measure from Bosman, way outside off stump, Bosman doesn't bother with the footwork as he throws his bat at that, gets a thick edge which soars over first slip and races for four
on the stumps this time from Shoaib, Bosman moves across and clips it towards square leg
slower ball, 116.5kmh, overpitched on legstump, Smith moves his front leg out of the way and whips that one past midwicket to collect another boundary, Shoaib wrings his hand in disgust

punched crisply towards Afridi at mid-off, Smith charges down the track but is sent back by Bosman as there was no single in it, Afridi shies at the striker's end, there's no one to collect it and there is an overthrow
tight line from Shoaib, inside-edged onto the pad by Bosman
starts with a length ball outside off, defended stoutly off the front foot
whips this full ball just in front of square leg
again Bosman inside-edges the ball onto his pads and towards square leg
fired down the leg side, keeper does well to collect
Bosman moves across a bit to work the ball behind square, stifled appeal for lbw but that was sliding down leg
another wide down the leg side
short of length and outside off, Bosman mistimes a punch towards extra cover
a touch short from Hafeez, Bosman comes down the track and works the ball towards midwicket
fires a quick ball down leg, Bosman moved away beyond leg, gets an inside-edge and the ball dribbles to the leg side

plumb as they come, Afridi makes an immediate impact, turned in after pitching on a length, Bosman was caught on the crease by that 95kmh delivery, in front of middle and just above the knee roll, that was going on to hit, umpire has no doubts, raises his finger in a jiffy
length ball outside off, driven towards cover for a single
this one holds its line after pitching outside off, Smith guides it to short third man for a quick single
de Villiers comes down the track and defends
lovely drive down to long-off for an easy couple
shortish ball, Smith comes down the track and works the ball from outside off and turns it towards midwicket
de Villiers comes waltzing down the track, Hafeez fires it in short, de Villiers adjusts and places the ball behind square
much fuller from Hafeez, Smith stays in his crease and looks to steer it towards point but can't collect
big appeal for lbw, in desperation clearly, Smith's down the track and is hit on the pads, but that was going to miss leg by a long way
'Yourself, yourself,' shouts the keeper as Smith punches the ball back to the bowler
whipped towards midwicket for a quick couple
all along the ground to long-off for a single
lovely delivery from Afridi, spins away from Smith, beats his bat and hits his back pad, outside off so the appeal was in vain
again spins away from Smith, starting from well outside off, Smith chases after that one and misses
this time he connects, Smith gets a big stride in and pushes the ball towards long-off to get off strike
on the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a isngle

dropped by Umar Akmal, who had taken a wonderful diving catch yesterday, this time he can't hang on at long-off after Smith chips the ball towards him, the ball hung in the air for a long time, the keeper desperately yelled 'Catch it, catch it,' Akmal had made his ground but still shelled it, Smith's charmed life continues, Afridi was livid
tucked to square leg for a single
driven towards long-off for a comfortable single
horribly mistimed by de Villiers, he took a clean swing at that overpitched delivery, but could only skew it towards mid-on, ball landing way short of long-on
Smith moves across the stumps and whips that one towards deep midwicket
again takes it from outside off and clips it towards midwicket
de Villiers charges out and can only tap the ball back towards the bowler
again Smith is troubled by the wrong 'un, he misses this one by a long way, it was well outside off

and again Smith is in some bother, gets the outside edge which flies towards but lands short of short third man, Gul dives to stop that, tries to flick it towards the man at point but the throw is wayward and gives away an overthrow
defended towards the bowler
well outside off, slapped towards point for a single
charges down the track and eases it towards long-on for a single
de Villiers waltzes down the track, the ball is very short and angled into the batsman, de Villiers slaps it towards square leg for a couple
driven along the ground towards the bowler

lovely catch from Farhat, it was a terrible delivery but still fetches a wicket, short and down the leg side, de Villiers could have dispatched that where he liked, he mows that one towards deep backward square leg, where Farhat makes plenty of ground to his left and hangs on to the ball a few yards inside the boundary
driven to mid-on for a single
down the leg side, Pakistan can't afford to give away freebies
a touch short, on legstump, punched off the back foot towards long-on
length ball heading down leg, Smith wanted to whip that one towards midwicket but he misses, ball rolls off the pads towards the off side
now Duminy's turn to miss Afridi's wrong ún
on legstump, tried to flick, gets a leading edge back towards the bowler
a bit short and well outside off, Duminy gets forward and blocks that one
goes for the reverse-sweep but he misses that one which was outside off, keeper collects
plenty of width for Duminy, he cracks it towards point for a single
and again Smith is flummoxed by Afridi, it's amazing Smith has survived so far, looking to drive and he misses the ball, end of a superb spell from Afridi: 4-0-13-1
Duminy waits on that one and steers it towards point

is that the end of Smith? he goes for a trademark mow towards midwicket, he misses and Zulqarnain takes off the bails, he's extremely confident he Smith is stumped, needs plenty of replays to decide but Smith is a goner, his back foot was on the line for a long time and the bails were off before he dragged it back in, Pakistan have hope
a drive away from the body brings an outside edge, it was in the air but flies wide of backward point and through for four
looks to sweep this time, can't connect
well outside off and he looks to sweep powerfully, misses again
pushed off the backfoot, Ajmal runs to his left to cut it off, Duminy was racing for a single and had to race back to make his ground, wonderful over to start from Ajmal
length ball angling across Duminy, guided down to fine leg
short ball just outside off, Ingram ducks under it, keeper collects and is quickly up to the stumps, some energy in the Pakistan camp now
shortish ball tight outside off, carved to point but can't get the single as the placement is poor
shortish ball, Ingram rocks back and slams that wide of long-on for four, pressure-relieving boundary that, Afridi screams in disappointment
powered it towards sweeper cover this time, fielder scrambles across to cut it off
that kept a touch low, pretty short and well outside off, hit near the toe end of the bat as he looks to play it towards cover
length ball, moves away from leg and flatbats it over the bowler's head, not too well timed so fielders in the deep converge and cut if off
into the pads, Ingram comes down the track and tucks the ball towards long-on
well outside leg, free run for South Africa
lovely hit from Duminy, length ball, Duminy gets to the pitch of the ball and clouts it over long-on for six, South Africa will breathe a little easier after that
defended to the right of the bowler
Duminy comes down the track and whips it towards deep midwicket , in the air but well short of the fielder
attacks legstump again, clipped towards midwicket
starts with a delivery down the leg side
what a hit from Ingram, a full toss is absolutely hammered over long-on, what a find Ingram is turning out to be for South Africa, showed a cool head yesterday as well
a full delivery angling into the pads, Ingram was lucky to get a boundary there, he was looking to hit it towards midwicket or square leg, an inside edge takes it past short fine for four
full and wide, square drive crisply by Ingram
poor bowling this, fine leg is in the circle, Shoaib sends a full toss on the pads, easy pickings that, tucked past short fine for four, South Africa are coasting now
Ingram is gone, he is disgusted as he holes out to long-on, a short ball to end the over, he pulls it but not with enough power to clear the fielder, Umar Akmal pouches it Aussie-style
a bit of an outside edge towards backward point, Duminy picks up a single
well outside off, batsman opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
Miller goes on the backfoot and taps it to the on side
that looked close, Miller goes for the sweep but misses, hitting him on off and middle
Duminy comes down the track and barely attempts a stroke as he is hit on the pads by a doosra
Miller gets forward and defends it to the off side
plays this one to mid-on, Duminy sets off immediately and zips through for the single
slips in the bouncer, on legstump, Miller went for the pull but doesn't connect

overpitched on middle and leg, squeezed out towards backward point, straight at the fielder but the batsmen go for the single, Miller has to dive to make his ground, direct hit would have made it very interesting

South Africa take the series 2-0, Duminy finishes it off in style, length ball on the pads, Duminy dispatches that over midwicket, he punches gloves with Miller, and the two batsmen are all smiles as South Africa complete another six-wicket victory
